document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Through </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">dark </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">sod </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">education, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">lily </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">passes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">sure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Through the dark sod as education
